data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Karauli, Rajasthan, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,442,160 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karauli, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Karauli, Rajasthan, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Karauli, Rajasthan, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Karauli a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Karauli words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Karauli, Rajasthan, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Karauli that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Karauli, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Karauli
location.people_groups_list: Bayad, Brahmin Sikhwal, Faqir, Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions), Jat Deswal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bayad (600), Brahmin Sikhwal (48,000), Faqir (90,000), Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions) (21,000), Jat Deswal (74,000)
